price: 85. Iimaankooduse ma ahayn mid anfacaya markay arkeen Cadaabkayaga, waa xeerka Alle oo horay ugu meel martay addoomahiisa. Waxaana ku khasaara halkaas gaalada (xaq diid oo dhan).
arabic: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falam yaku yanfaʿuhum īmānuhum lammā ra-aw basanā sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat fī ʿibādihi wakhasira hunālika al-kāfirūna
